website_summaries.verdict: If you care more about having a long lens at a low price than photo quality or manual controls, the Olympus SP-800UZ is an option.
pros: full, searchable user manual stored in camera

customer_reviews.title: Oly's  super-zoom cameras are handy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th in a series of Olympus cameras and does very well. Oly has changed to a more common memory card which is nice if you take movies. This does a great job on movies too. The battery is a bit small if you take many flash pictures. Be sure and carry a spare.....and be sure the spare is charged. This camera is so much lighter and easier to handle than my old ones and much of that is due to the new high-tech battery.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Shubert

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: In college I borrowed a friend's Olympus SLR camera and had a ball. I got an A in the class. This probably bonded me to Olympus forever. My own camera for a long time was a Nikkormat. Another great SLR, but heavy and intrusive. I decided to begin taking pictures again and have loved this little Olympus. It is a higher end point and shoot, I can manipulate it a bit, but do not have as much freedom as I had with the completely manual cameras. The camera comes with a good amount of storage. I've bought an SD card and my next accessory will be an extra battery. This camera has made the world of digital photography quite seductive!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: best super zoom for price
customer_reviews.text: For $250 (July 4th sale), I was finally convinced to buy it. I am planning to use it for vacation in Hawaii. My prime purpose for getting this camera is the super zoom. Its cheaper compared to other super zoom cameras because they took off a lot of extras which I rarely or don't use such as: -view finder -horse shoe -manual (you can download this) -software (you can download this as needed) -video quality is minimal(this is not designed for this, get a video camera if you love taking videos. Don't buy it if you need those items listed.
customer_reviews.author: Shinigami

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP-800UZ  Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera after having bought, and subsequently returned, a Nikon that we were not pleased with. We'd previously had an Olympus that was accidently dropped. It was several years old and would have been prohibitively expensive to repair. We are so pleased with this Olympus SP-800UZ camera. We are in a business that requires very detailed close-ups of antique coins, stamps, political buttons etc. and the 30x zoom is just the ticket! Also, I've used many different photographic software programs over the years and the Olympus Master software is the most intuitive and user-friendly I've ever found.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zamora

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is good for the price i paid for it 250.00 but i would not pay more. Its just not a good enough camera for the 350.00 price ive seen elsewhere.It is a nice small body camera with a large lens and it was not to hard to use. Its good for general photography but dont expect to do any bigtime photography with it. If your looking for a point and shoot camera with a large zoom lens, that does the things a DSLR will do but with a fixed lens, go with panasonic lumix or a Canon. I do like this camera, and im sure my wife will love it also.
customer_reviews.author: tex

customer_reviews.title: After a few months, the jury is out on this so-so camera!
customer_reviews.text: I was truly excited about the 30X optical zoom, which is very cool however, indoor picture quality and low light pics are far from good! I have tried and tried to tweak the parameters and cannot get a satisfactory result. About half the time though I luck out and get some pretty amazing photos, but just not enough to make me totally happy with this purchase. Seems to be built pretty rugged though and feels like a quality camera. Part of the problem is that I know I'm a novice and lack in photography knowledge!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: great camers
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CAMERA. i AM USED TO HAVING FILM CAMERAS WITH A MULTITUDE OF LENSES-THIS WILL FIT THE BILL AS A REPLACEMENT. SURE THERE ARE OTHER BETTER (AND MORE EXPENSIVE) CAMERAS OUT THERE-BUT THIS IF GOOD FOR ME. DELIVERED AS STATED, BUT TOOK A FEW DAYS TO PROCESS-STILL ARRIVED BY THE 18TH. IT APPEARED LARGER IN THE PHOTO, BUT COMPACT IS NICE.
customer_reviews.author: navydoc192

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use in 'point and shoot' mode but has ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for a while now. It is easy to use in 'point and shoot' mode but has all the manual settings anyone might ask for. The videos come out crisp and smooth. The 30x zoom has to be seen to be believed.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Seiler

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP-800UZ 14MP Digital Camera with 30x Wide Angle Dual Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0 inch LCD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera mainly to take pictures of our Pomeranian puppies we have for sale...The pictures come out very clear and are always in focus, I cannot say that for my Nikon D70...It functions as stated the only draw back is it doesn't have a external flash bar attachment, but if you don't need one the built in flash works just fine...I have taken pictures from as close as 2 inches to infinity and they are all clear and in focus...I would definitely recommend this camera...
customer_reviews.author: Don E. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP800UZ
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Olympus camera and this is undeniably the best one yet. The Olympus SP800UZ is a great compact camera. It may not be as light-sensitive as the SLRs but it takes great pictures with fantastic zoom capability. Have only taken approximately 250 pictures and have only found fault with a handful, and these I attribute to my during the learning phase of camera usage. Overall I feel this was a good solid investment in my photography journey.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. Schoen

customer_reviews.title: great ultra zoom camera
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the best camera I ever owned. A workhorse. I recently bought a 2nd battery as back-up but it usually doesn't need it. I maxed out the memory card once on a trip to Grand Canyon but only once.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Hartke

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP 800-uz
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is excellent with great resolution. The original battery that came with the camera ran very low after 100 pictures and a 2 minute video so a 2nd or 3rd battery will be necessary. It is very easy to use with its user friendly menu. The quality lacks on videos and you cannot use the zoom feature while the video is recording. It's an excellent camera for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Home Handy Man

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable camera
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it to replace my old one just like it. Tough camera. Can take being banged around and dropped etc. The old one simply wore out.
customer_reviews.author: sus

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact camera and it broke, so I replaced it with the same. While I like the camera very much....it takes wonderful pictures....I am not happy with the pause between pictures and the battery doesn't last very long. I now have 4 batteries that keep me going. I will be getting my broken camera fixed for backup.
customer_reviews.author: Bellyjel

customer_reviews.title: Great camera the Lents focus very clear
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to have this camera all I do is take the pictures and download it to my computer Great Camera :)
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP-800UZ 14MP Digital Camera with...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price but a few complaints. You can't see the lcd in bright sunlight forget it. If you want to take video and zoom in the sound is automatically muted. It's hard to review your pictures to see if they are clear and not fuzzy while trying to review outdoors. Other than that the quality of photos are wonderful the video quality and color is 3 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ez4u2say

customer_reviews.title: Needs Viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera with one huge exception. You have to hold it away from you to take a picture as there is no viewfinder to use. This is a huge mistake as because of the extreme magnification it is virtually impossible to hold the camera so that it is steady enough to take a picture. Fantastic camera with a major, major flaw. Maybe Olympus with figure this out for the next version as the camera is close to useless as it is unless you go to the trouble of setting up and using a tripod. The major benefit of the extreme zoom is therefor negated.
customer_reviews.author: Nakina Ace

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the picture quality, and the high def video. I do have trouble steadying the camera for the videos, but I'm trying to work on improving that. Of course, the tighter you zoom in, the more "jittery" the video gets. It's a matter of trying to steady the camera. I love the high def pictures, and the 30X zoom is absolutely amazing! I can buy tickets to a concert, be sitting a ways back, and STILL get some very nice pictures! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alejo Guevara Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a great camera. Not too much experience
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great camera. Not too much experience, this is only my second camera but I'm very happy with it and can take some pretty good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in shutter response when you push the button and ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera is ok. Doesn't hold a candle to a Canon that's for sure. Very disappointed in shutter response when you push the button and it doesn't have attachments for the lens.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: meh camera, promptly returned
customer_reviews.text: the zoom and stabilization is incredible on this camera, but i wasnt impressed with the picture or video quality. battery life was good for both pix and vids. i knew it had a stationary lcd when i bought it, but it was a bigger issue then i thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: fishy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb camera at a superb price. I have only been amazed by the quality and versatility of the camera. The menu's are easy to navigate and offer a wide variety of functionality for even the most amateur of photographers. It is light, easy to handle and when set in 'auto mode' takes some great pictures. The LCD is super clear and the camera has great response times when taking pictures. All in all great value for money for somebody that is not yet in the "professional" market of taking pictures!
customer_reviews.author: sam1j@aws

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: I tried so hard to like this camera. Took many pictures and used most of the settings(yes, I did read the manual.) But I have to say, only had about two or three "clear" shots out of the bunch. I took a picture and took the same picture with my Kodak 14mp. My Kodak was far more sharper than this camera. I loved the fact of the 30x zoom (my Kodak only has 5x) but what good is it if I can't get the crisp pictures I want. Sent back today...
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera...out of the box I was taking amazing pics...the zoom is crazy good and the auto features are easy to navigate!! I have already made great use of the bird watching setting and will post some of these if possible...I have not used the video feature yet...this Sat. this camera will be going to Yankee Stadium to take some shots of my favorite boys in pinstripes!!! Thank you Olympus!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Woyke

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in April and am very pleased. Picture quality and zoom are excellent. The software that came with it is a little clunky and I'll be looking for something different. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Colley

customer_reviews.title: olympus camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for the 30x optical zoom. I like everything about it except the lens cap. It is not attached and pops off if you forget to take it off before you turn it on. I t takes great pictures and has lots of options to give you great photos. The other negative is no guide book except on line which means if you want to carry it with you - you have to download and print the manual- not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: P. beaver

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these one for me and one for me and one for my wife. Great camera for the price I don't think you can beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Casa

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. The pictures quality are excellent! > The only thing I don't like...can't zoom when is on video.
customer_reviews.author: axestrella

customer_reviews.title: Pure Olympus Camera Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun Camera to use. I don't have all the bells and whistles down yet,but I have taken Head Shots and some very nice vistas with this Olympus. As usual the Japanese Quality is there. It is easy to charge the battery. It can also take Viedo. You will need a tripod to take photographs using the zoom. It is worthwhile to buy the camera cas. This camera can make you into a real Pro in a very short time. Sincerely, Diarmuid Harrington
customer_reviews.author: Diarmuid P. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera as a replacement for my Canon dSLR that broke. It's a lot smaller than i expected, which was actually a nice surprise. It's also a lot cooler looking than in the pictures, very shiny and has a good weight to it, not cheap plastic. It has lot's of cool settings, but the pictures using these don't come out very good. It's just a point and shoot with a lot of zoom power, so don't expect anything more, but if that's all you need it's a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Copter

customer_reviews.title: This used camera is heavy and bulky and will not ...
customer_reviews.text: This used camera is heavy and bulky and will not find the internal 1 gig memory to my computer and their manual does not give instructions- as a result I purchased another. lighter newer nikon s 7000 and now have 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP 800 UZ
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a vacation trip. Very satisfied with the camera. It may not do some of the things that the more expensive cameras can do, but the picture results are all that matter and this camera delivers.
customer_reviews.author: James Lon Van Vorous

customer_reviews.title: Could have been a good camera.
customer_reviews.text: Display malfunctioned after 2 years. Cost more to repair than a new camera.
customer_reviews.author: Business EastBay SF

customer_reviews.title: Nice digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera since March 2011. Great pictures. Easy to operate. However the video option is not easy and the video resolution is not very good. The video zoom is not an easy to operate. Iwould recommend this camera to any body. As a matter of fact I am ready to order the new SP820 UZ iHS that has a 40x zoom and a full HD video resolution. Ifind the price very affordable too..
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A Suarez

customer_reviews.title: olympus camera
customer_reviews.text: i just purchase this camera and i am in love with it, but right now i am just getting to know how to use it. i think it is the BOM, cant go wrong with this one the best choice for my money. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: H. Prawl

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Purshased as gift for husband, it is light and compact for the features this camera offers. He has been very pleased. This camera offers a lot for the price, is a great point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love all the features this camera has to offer. I've done photography professionally, and the picture quality is superb. I totally recommend it. Enjoy all the possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: Donna K. Matoes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our honeymoon in Napa and never regretted it! great zoom, great picture quality, easy to put on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: JKinGA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It has all the necessary tools for a good pic!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adequate for a point and shoot camera, which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Does it all
customer_reviews.text: Camera has a great feel. Great screen even in direct sun. Zoom is amazing. Very versatile. Outstanding picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My New Camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice camera, however, it didn't suit my needs even after reading the many reviews & research I did before buying it. Despite the many settings, I could not get it to function or shoot how I needed it to. The camera is for those with more knowledge than I as an amateur. I was satisfied with the dealer & how quickly I received the camera & I will continue to order from them if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q Gentry

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the camera, however I am very unhappy with all of the junk e-mail that I have been recieving since buying the camera. Maybe it's just a coincidance...hmmmmm.
customer_reviews.author: cla

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know; and, quite honestly, I think Olympus Customer Service stinks; but, then again, maybe I caught them on a bad day. It was too expensive; and I regret spending the money. It's much too complicated for me to use, has numerous features that might as well be, 'from Mars'; and, even though I've used other Olympus products for more than 20 years, I wouldn't buy a camera from them again.
customer_reviews.author: John Grayman

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves It
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a present for my husband. He loves it! Hasn't discovered all it can do, but he's been playing with it. I printed the manuel for him, though he hasn't read much of it yet. Hopefully he will and really use all it's options. I think I may have finally gotten him into the 21st century and away from "film".
customer_reviews.author: SJCatlady

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera while. I've played with the panoramic feature which is cool and works ever so neat. I mainly use it for point and shoot pics, which this camera is overkill for, but it takes those so great.
customer_reviews.author: John Nickias Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this camera.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst camera I have ever bought. I got it and then became sick, so it sat in it's case for six months. When I got better, I tried using it and found out that it has multiple problems with focus and exposure. I have two Lumix, one Sureshot, and three Nikons that all leave this camera in the dust. Do yourself a service by not buying this camera.
customer_reviews.author: RealNeil

customer_reviews.title: Love this Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The picture quality is amazing and you can't beat the 30x zoom! My only complaint is the battery life. It's not that long, but I'm going to order a back up battery so I'll always have one charged. Other than that, I am very pleased with my purchase and would recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: lsutigr

customer_reviews.title: Poor Instructions with Camera
customer_reviews.text: There are no real instructions with this camera. When the instructions that did come with the camera stated to find the instructions digitally within the camera, I tried that, but they would not appear. I scrolled through as many options as I could find, and never could work out how to operate the camera well. Also, it does NOT come with a memory card. Fortunately I had one from another camera. I would suggest that complete written instructions come with the camera or directions to a link where they could be found. If this had been the case, I would have likely kept the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice zoom, easy to use, I have used this camera for years now.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Wiebe

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Its a great camera at a great price. Has all the features to compete with any other camera well above its price tag. Packed with a long list of features, but not missing what it should do best - take pictures. Apealing equally to a novice as well as experienced person for photography.
customer_reviews.author: Chirag Dave

customer_reviews.title: Camera review
customer_reviews.text: Great camera purchased for daughter. She is very happy with it and the zoom feature works great! A great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.author: William Francis

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my camera purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very good for inexperienced photographers. I like being able to download the manual onto my laptop. I like having the capability to zoom in as much as this camera allows.
customer_reviews.author: Laine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My first Olympus camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Olympus camare. I bought it because the zoom 30x, and it works really good. It is very easy to use, and if you want to change any specifications, you can do it any time or if you want to take a picture in AUTO, it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andris Felipe Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The camera was as advertised, delivered on time what more could I ask. I have had a couple Olympus Cameras and have always been pleased with quality and clarity of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This camera is well worth the money, I waited years to upgrade my digital camera and im glad I chose the Olympus SP-800UZ.
customer_reviews.author: Crash 517

customer_reviews.title: My Olimpus
customer_reviews.text: I AM VERY SATISFAID WHITH MY OLIMPUS, IT IS COMPACT, HAS A TREMEDOUS FOCAL LENGT RANGE 30X Y DO NOT NEED TO CARRY A CUMBERSOME LOT OF LENSES, IS A 14 MEGAPIXEL, THE IMAGE IS VERY GOOD AND THE PRICE IS VERY ATRACTIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Raúl Mendizábal Morris

customer_reviews.title: excelent camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product really worked properly and was again as expected, in this case was very pleased with the purchase, I highly recommend it as the supplier.
customer_reviews.author: William Pedraza B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The camera feels great in your hands, it has a good grip! A great point and shoot camera! has many options and configurations. the only downfall is that it sometimes takes a little bit for it to focus. shipment was fast.
customer_reviews.author: MMcKool

customer_reviews.title: the best camera i've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the product. The product arrived within the agreed time and in very good condition. i had olympus cameras before this one but this is the best. It takes very good pictures and with it's ultra 30x zoom you can get perfect close pictures.
customer_reviews.author: navisailor 1203

customer_reviews.title: olympus sp 800uz
customer_reviews.text: Camera is very nice especially considering that it is a good quality camera that costs half as much as comparable cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Layne

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera on the advice of a friend and am not disappointed. I love the features and I am finding out that it is a lot smarter than I am in some cases as I am learning to use it. it is light years ahead of my ten year old Olympus 1.2 megapixal with only digital zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this camera is quite simply one of the best in the market. I love the quality of the pics and the product is built so well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nazhat

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: absolutly wonderful camera. i love it only had it a couple of weeks but my last camera was a 7.1 mega pixel and this camera makes it look like a kids camera.
customer_reviews.author: the deeds

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am no photographer but for my use the camera does the job. So far it has been easy to use, but I have not tried any special settings as of yet. It was nice having 2 GB of memory come with the camera. The photo quality is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it
customer_reviews.text: 1-This camera is SLOW 2-the battery is worst. It takes about 20 pictures the battery is dead! Don't get it. I feel regret when I bought this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Mystic

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with 30X zoom and panorama possibilities
customer_reviews.text: Was a replacement for what I had. Great camera with 30X zoom and panorama possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: the Coop

customer_reviews.title: I am OK with the camera but!
customer_reviews.text: For a life of me cant figure out the setting to make a 14megapixel picture with it. The screen says, 14mp and all the photos turns out to be 5mp ish. Its very disappointing because i am having a trip, and wanted to have high res photos. Any hint how to set the machine for the 14mp shots? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: msUser1111

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great shots on the auto mode. The red eye reduction feature is excellent, best I've seen on a camera at this price point. Has great panoramic mode feature as well. The more I use it the more I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R.

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality, but not date in pictures, no zoom in video mode, menu buttom extremely sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Rica

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality is not good
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to see a camera with 30x zoom, but I could not accept the image quality. Amazon was very generous with their return policy, and I'm now a very happy owner of a Canon EOS 60D. I suggest you to compare camera sample images at [...] before choosing a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had my camera for almost a month now and I love it! Everyone I know wants their photos done and I was able to finally open my own photography place :)
customer_reviews.author: N. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP-800UZ
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera great for quick shot and lots of new set that are cool. It very easy to run. I am a camera nut I have lots of them. Amazon is the best!
customer_reviews.author: akearringlady44

customer_reviews.title: olympus camera
customer_reviews.text: this is the best camera I have ever seen , and for sure for this great price, this camera is better then my sony, this camera dus so many great options never seen that before
customer_reviews.author: renata

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly good camera in this price. It clearly oustands any basic DSLR cameras. With the best feature og inbuilt 2 GB memory it acts as a back up in case u run out of spcae on ur Mem Card.
customer_reviews.author: Koolsoumo

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP-800UZ
customer_reviews.text: The first camera I received was not working properly and was returned to the vendor. The vendor was very helpful and quickly replaced the product. I shot some photos with it soon thereafter and I am pleased with the results. I think a wrist strap should be supplied with the camera instead of a neck strap otherwise, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Better in some ways
customer_reviews.text: I previously had an Olympus H9 that worked excellent. It was only an 8 mp so I thought I would move up to a 14mp with a few other features. The learning curve was greater than expected. In some settings the focus does not seem to focus properly. It would continue to go in and out of focus.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: After use I find the finest semi professional camera And options for easy and high-definition zoom and a strong Excellent camera that is talking
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed S. Almuqbil

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Total disappointment. Read the reviews and saved for months to buy it. Got it and took 300 pictures in 24 hours in all conditions: outside, inside, motion, portrait, close-up. Seriously not even 1 good shot. I tried all the settings and normally only use the auto setting on any camera. No setting could produce a single useable picture. Very slow to take 2 pictures in a row, very slow to actually take the picture, and impossible to get a clear image if your subject moves ever so slightly. Actually returned this camera 1 day after purchase and that speaks volumes because I never return anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara F

customer_reviews.title: Poor camera
customer_reviews.text: Had two cameras one died when the zoom just stopped going out so I had to switch it off and start again. I had two spare batteries and it still only lasted for about two hours of shooting. Got a second one and the screen cracked after a month and Amazon would not replace it. Heap of rubbish do not buy there are plenty of better cameras out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tandiwe

customer_reviews.title: I Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm not professional. This camera is surprising me in many ways. I will go on vacations next week and them i'll write a review
customer_reviews.author: Didou

product_meta.title: Olympus SP-800UZ 14MP Digital Camera with 30x Wide Angle Dual Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0 inch LCD (Old Model),Black
product_meta.description:
OLYMPUS 227665 14.0 Megapixel SP-800UZ Digital Camera

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Inside its slim, elegant body, the SP-800UZ hides something amazing: a 30x wide-angle optical zoom. Bringing you all the power of a 30x zoom in a camera that’s small enough to go wherever your travels take you. And with advanced features like Creative Art Filters, you can truly express yourself. 

30x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom (F2.8-F5.6, 28-840mm Equivalent) The longest, most powerful zoom in the world is also incredibly compact and portable. It zooms in 30x for extreme close-ups, then all the way back out for wide-angle panoramas. 
HD Movie 720p A simple, one-touch button allows you to record movies with amazing clarity in high-definition, right from your camera. 
Dual Image Stabilization The 2-in-1 anti-blur solution. Sensor-Shift Image Stabilization, which keeps your shot steady by compensating for camera shake, combines with Digital Image Stabilization to capture crisp, clear images in any situation. 
AF Tracking Automatically tracks unpredictable, fast-moving subjects like kids and pets. Continuously adjusts the focus and brightness so you can easily capture a great shot of your subject in motion. 
Creative Art Filters Give your photos a distinct look and artistic feel by applying one of four different Magic Filter effects, including Pop Art, Pinhole, Fisheye and Drawing. 

Olympus SP-800UZ Features 

14 Megapixel
An amazing 14 million pixels in the high-resolution CCD create superior image quality. Create poster-sized prints without losing a single detail. 

30x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom
All the capabilities you need in one compact lens. The 30x optical zoom gets you amazingly close to the action while the 28mm wide-angle lens lets you capture breathtaking panoramas. 

3-inch LCD
The huge 3-inch LCD features an extra-wide viewing angle and anti-glare technology for easier composing and shooting even in direct, bright sunlight. 

HD Movie 720p
A simple, one-touch button allows you to record movies with amazing clarity in high-definition, right from your camera. 

Dual Image Stabilization
Dual Image Stabilization combines Sensor-Shift Image Stabilization with high ISO sensitivity and fast shutter speeds to capture crisp, clear images in any situation. 

2 GB Internal Memory
Store more photos and videos than ever before, right in your camera with 2GB of internal memory (usable memory is 1.83GB). 

AF Tracking
AF Tracking automatically tracks unpredictable, fast-moving subjects such as kids and pets, and continuously adjusts the focus and brightness so you can capture these photogenic whirlwinds with ease. 

Creative Art Filters
Using Creative Art Filters you can give your photos a distinct look and artistic feel by applying one of four different in-camera effects, including Pop Art, Pinhole, Fisheye and Drawing. 

Intelligent Auto
The Intelligent Auto setting identifies the scene you're shooting -- portrait, landscape, night portrait, macro, or sport -- and adjusts the settings to optimize results. 

Advanced Face Detection
Face Detection automatically focuses on your subjects' faces and optimizes exposure for sharp, brilliant portrait pictures. 

In-Camera Panorama
Captures three images and stitches them together to create one amazing panoramic picture by simply pressing the shutter button and slowly panning across a panoramic scene. 

Shadow Adjustment
Shadow Adjustment Technology helps you capture scenes exactly as you see them, even in difficult lighting situations--perfect for outside shots in bright sun when dark shadows are prevalent or shooting in backlit situations. 

Beauty Mode
Beauty Mode lets you smooth a person’s skin, removing unwanted wrinkles or blemishes. Additionally, make subtle edits, such as slightly emphasizing and brightening the eyes, with a new post-capture feature: Beauty Fix. 

Perfect Shot Preview
Using a live, multi-frame window on the LCD, Perfect Shot Preview lets you view the effects of various settings and then select and capture the perfect shot.
feature_bullets: HD Movie 720p; one-touch button allows you to record movies in high-definition
3-inch LCD features an extra-wide viewing angle and anti-glare technology
2 GB internal memory; capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory (not included)
